post016.title: Publishing Technology
post016.author: charsmotion
post016.description:
Publishing Technology a multinational company with offices around the globe, contacted us to design and animate a video loop to be played in the Frankfurt Book Fair in Germany on October 4/13. Here's the video!

Art Direction: Charsmotion
Design: Andres Rossi
2D/3D Animation: Charsmotion and Andres Rossi
Music/sounds compositing: Charsmotion
